title: This assignment will help you to recollect the syntax and semantics while writing and executing a java program.

quizDescription.text: Use the below code for answering the following questions

questions.questionText: Describe what happens if you omit main in the above code
Describe what happens if you omit String in the above code
Describe what happens if you omit HelloWorld in the above code
Describe what happens if you omit System.out in the above code
Describe what happens if you omit println in the above code
